explains: n. （舞台的）背景幕布；周围景物；（事件的）背景
v. 位于……后面，位于……远处

sentences.en: Their love affair was played out against the backdrop of war.
sentences.cn: 他们在战争的背景下发生恋情。

sentences.en: The profits rise was achieved against a backdrop of falling metal prices.
sentences.cn: 利润的增长是在金属价格下降的背景下取得的。

sentences.en: The election will take place against a backdrop of increasing instability.
sentences.cn: 选举的背景是逐渐不稳的局势。
